## Background and context

### Regulatory landscape

[Provide background on relevant regulations, directives or standards. Include:]

- **Legal status:** Binding, proposed, draft
- **Effective dates:** When do requirements take effect?
- **Scope:** Which industries, company sizes or products are affected?
- **Compliance requirements:** What must organisations do?

### GS1 standards landscape

[Describe relevant GS1 standards and their current state:]

- **Current coverage:** What do existing GS1 standards provide?
- **Gaps:** Where are there limitations or missing elements?
- **Evolution:** How are GS1 standards evolving to meet new requirements?

## GS1 Style Guide compliance checklist

<!-- 
This checklist should be completed before finalising the report
Delete this section before delivery
-->

- [ ] **Date format:** DD Month YYYY (e.g., 15 January 2025)
- [ ] **Headings:** Sentence case (only first word capitalised)
- [ ] **Abbreviations:** Spelled out on first use with initial capitals
- [ ] **British English:** analyse, organisation, standardise (not analyze, organization, standardize)
- [ ] **"standard" not capitalised:** "GS1 standards" not "GS1 Standards"
- [ ] **"e.g.," with comma:** "e.g., example" not "e.g. example"
- [ ] **No Oxford comma:** "A, B and C" not "A, B, and C"
- [ ] **Document titles italicised:** *GS1 Style Guide* (unless hyperlinked)
- [ ] **Alt text for images:** All figures have descriptive alt text
- [ ] **Tables accessible:** Headers defined, no merged cells
- [ ] **Lists formatted:** Lead-in sentence, consistent punctuation
- [ ] **Registered trademarks:** DataBar¬Æ, GDSN¬Æ, EAN¬Æ (first use only)
